QuestData.Title: Taking the Fight to Nagrand
QuestData.Description: Commander, good to see you. With the fall of the rangari base at Telaar, Vindicator Yrel, recommended that we establish a new foothold in Nagrand.$b$bI've taken the liberty of dispatching some of our men and supplies. Rangari D'kaan's already reporting that the outpost is nearly complete. He asked me to let you know they are ready for you.$b$bA gryphon is waiting to catch you up with the latest caravan shipment whenever you're ready, $g sir:ma'am;.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lieutenant Balfor at the caravan in Nagrand.
QuestData.RewardText: They came at us... from... nowhere.$B$B<The lieutenant nearly passes out.>
